title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new pdf emitter
description: The issue is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not have the expected effect.
OB: Currently, setting the display property to 'none' on an item does not hide the item in the new PDF emitter. The item remains visible.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be hidden from view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label to the PDF emitter. 
2. Open the 'properties' view. 
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property of the label to 'none'. 
4. Verify that the label is still visible in the new PDF emitter, despite the 'sectionDisplay' property being set to 'none'.
